LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to display selected fields from a record

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon name
property.description: On the format category:iconName. See available icons: https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: viewedObjectApiName
property.label: Object API Name (Keep blank if displaying information from current record)
property.description: Required if displaying information from a related record

property.name: relationshipField
property.label: Relationship field (API)
property.description: Required if displaying information from a related record

property.name: displayedFields
property.label: Fields to display (API names, comma separated)

property.name: showLink
property.label: Click to preview
property.description: If true, the first displayed field shows a link to the record
